message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a high-quality item valued at $100, but at a slightly discounted price. Don't miss out!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your budget constraints. However, I must respectfully decline your offer of $80. Our current price is $90, which still represents a great value considering the product's quality. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $87? I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.
